title: Shifting Values And Staying Motivated At Work
itunes:title: Shifting Values And Staying Motivated At Work
description:
Casey Wahl, CEO of Attuned, talks AI regulation and the way we work. Alex Amezquita, CFO, and John Agwunobi, CEO, of Herbalife Nutrition discuss the latest earnings and outlook. Jim Anderson, CEO of SocialFlow, explains the decision to uphold Donald Trump's suspension from Facebook. Jordan Goldstein, Global Director of Design at Gensler, discusses building sustainability. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller. (Kailey Leinz fills in for Paul Sweeney)

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
